sections.title: The Exit Interview
sections.intent: Establish Artie's mundane life and sudden, absurd death.
sections.end_condition: Artie locks in his 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.

sections.title: The First Spawn
sections.intent: Show the immediate danger of a 1 HP build in a hostile tutorial zone.
sections.end_condition: Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.

sections.title: The Safe Zone?
sections.intent: Reach the first hub and establish the world's culture and primary rivalry.
sections.end_condition: Artie makes his first rival in Vane and barely escapes a forced duel.

sections.title: Shopping for Scraps
sections.intent: Equip Artie with the bare minimum to survive a dungeon through exploits.
sections.end_condition: Artie acquires the 'Cloak of the Cowardly Lion' and a cursed beacon item.

sections.title: The Crypt of Bad Math
sections.intent: Test the new gear and the Crit-build in a controlled environment.
sections.end_condition: Artie discovers he can farm resources via System Overload effects.

sections.title: The Rival's Shadow
sections.intent: Reintroduce Vane as a persistent threat and trigger the boss encounter.
sections.end_condition: The Bone Golem emerges, placing Artie at a massive mechanical disadvantage.

sections.title: The Dance of Death
sections.intent: A high-octane fight where Artie must dodge every single attack.
sections.end_condition: Artie collapses the floor, trapping the Golem in a physics glitch.

sections.title: The Final Blow
sections.intent: Resolve the boss fight with a comedic but effective exploit.
sections.end_condition: Artie hits Level 10 and the System begins monitoring him closely.

sections.title: Looting the Teacups
sections.intent: Examine the rewards and the consequences of the fight.
sections.end_condition: Artie uses his new speed to outrun Vane's party toward the capital.

sections.title: The City of Gold and Glitches
sections.intent: Establish the capital city and the religious weight of 'Crits'.
sections.end_condition: Artie realizes his 1 HP build is permanent and illegal to fix.

sections.title: The Underground Market
sections.intent: Artie looks for illegal mods to help him survive.
sections.end_condition: Artie escapes a Sentinel raid with a Lag-Switch potion and a binary speech curse.

sections.title: The Arena Invitation
sections.intent: Set up the tournament climax and the high financial stakes.
sections.end_condition: Vane prepares to 'delete' Artie in the upcoming tournament.

sections.title: The Round of 32
sections.intent: Show Artie's growth and tactical use of his crits in the arena.
sections.end_condition: Artie moves to the quarter-finals despite mid-match System nerfs.

sections.title: The Quarter-Finals: The Mirror Match
sections.intent: Artie faces a character with high evasion, forcing a change in strategy.
sections.end_condition: The System applies a 'Random Debuff' to Artie for his next match.

sections.title: The Semi-Finals: The Debuff
sections.intent: Artie must overcome a mechanical handicap (Inverted Controls).
sections.end_condition: Artie reaches the finals against a rigged Vane.

sections.title: Vane's Ultimate Build
sections.intent: Show the power of a 'Whale' player vs. a 'Glitch' player.
sections.end_condition: Artie targets the magic aura around Vane's armor to bypass the Reflect buff.

sections.title: Breaking the Game
sections.intent: The moment of peak absurdity where the world begins to dissolve.
sections.end_condition: Artie and Fizz escape deletion as the world enters 'Safe Mode'.

sections.title: The Aftermath of the Crash
sections.intent: Show the immediate consequences of the reality crash.
sections.end_condition: Artie realizes his HP is now 'NaN' and he has become a virus.

sections.title: The New Normal
sections.intent: Establish the new status quo for Artie and Fizz in the Null-Zone.
sections.end_condition: Artie realizes his immortality is as glitchy and annoying as his 1 HP build.

sections.title: The Resistance
sections.intent: Introduce the Beta-Tester faction and the long-term goal.
sections.end_condition: The series quest to 'Delete the Admin' is officially locked in.

sections.title: The First Step
sections.intent: End on a high note of action and anticipation for the sequel.
sections.end_condition: Artie steps into a portal to the Glitch-Woods, ending Book 1.
